summary: Completed testing of refactored Meetings & MOM module split into Sales Meetings and Consulting Meetings. All 20 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified - both pages load correctly with all features working.

issues: Console warnings about HTML hydration errors - <span> as child of <option>/<select>/<tbody> - cosmetic only, doesn't affect functionality

critical_code_review_comments: Meeting model correctly includes 'type' field defaulting to 'consulting'
Role-based access properly enforced: SALES_MEETING_ROLES=['admin', 'executive', 'account_manager'], CONSULTING_MEETING_ROLES includes PM/consultant roles
HR Manager correctly denied access (403) for both meeting types
Consulting meetings require project_id (returns 400 without it)
Sales meetings work without project_id (lead linking optional)
Commitment tracking endpoint /api/consulting-meetings/tracking returns accurate project-level data
Navigation correctly shows Sales Meetings under Sales Funnel section, Consulting Meetings in main nav
Consulting MOM dialog has full action items functionality (Sales MOM simplified without action items)
seed_data_creation: Created test sales and consulting meetings during backend testing. 7 sales meetings and 3 consulting meetings exist.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Meetings module split complete. Key endpoints: POST /api/meetings (with type='sales'/'consulting'), GET /api/meetings?meeting_type=sales/consulting, GET /api/consulting-meetings/tracking. Frontend routes: /sales-meetings, /consulting-meetings. Sales MOM simplified (no action items), Consulting MOM has full action items with follow-up task creation. Email sending is MOCKED - notifications queued in DB but not sent.

features_tested.POST /api/meetings type=sales (admin): PASSED - Created sales meeting with lead linking
features_tested.Sales Meetings page UI: PASSED - Stats, list, add dialog all work
features_tested.Consulting Meetings page UI: PASSED - Tabs, stats, tracking table, add dialog work
features_tested.Consulting MOM dialog with action items: PASSED - Full action items form present

navigation_structure.Sales Meetings: Under 'Sales Funnel' section in sidebar (visible to sales roles)
navigation_structure.Consulting Meetings: In main navigation above 'Email Templates' (visible to consulting roles)

mocked_apis_list: Email sending for MOM to client - queued in notifications collection but not actually sent
